nodes.text: Rep was the title given to Gungan officials who sat on the Gungan High Council of Otoh Gunga on the planet Naboo during the last decades of the Galactic Republic.

The Reps were distinguished by their tall hoods and long, patterned robes similar in appearance to those worn by the Boss of Otoh Gunga. Each Rep was responsible for a different aspect of the Gungan government, from maintaining historical records to overseeing the city's power supplies.
